channel.title: Directory Service on TRISA Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Directory Service on TRISA Documentation

item.title: Accessing Members
item.description: The TRISAMembers service is an experimental service that provides extra, secure access to the directory service for verified TRISA members. Only members of the TRISA network (e.g. members who have been issued valid identity certificates) can access detailed directory service data about the network using this service. Note: Once validated, this service will be moved into the official TRISA specification. The TRISAMembers Service This section describes the protocol buffers for the TRISAMembers endpoint, which can be found here.
